definition: any substance that can be metabolized by an animal to give energy and build tissue
details:
noun
- any substance that can be metabolized by an animal to give energy and build tissue
= synonyms: nutrient
- anything that provides mental stimulus for thinking
= synonyms: food for thought, intellectual nourishment
- any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
= example: any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
= synonyms: solid food
